name: Unicorn Defense
description:
Humans are killing trees! As a unicorn, you have to protect the trees!

Press Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen mode!

Walk around, find your friends (more unicorns!) and kill all humans.

This is something between a simple RPG and an RTS game.

The intro has four pages :) .

Jam notes

I made this for the Jam for All BASIC Dialects (#2)  with FreeBASIC 1.05. The theme I followed is Open, because the world is open to all sides (as long as you do not exceed your computer's memory).  Actually, I only spent about two days on the project and even slept and ate sometimes.

All graphics assets I created myself. The tree, flowers and reeds graphics I made some years ago for another (yet unpublished) project. The unicorn, human and arrow graphics are new and were created in the aforementioned timeframe.

There is no sound or music. Because I do not speak Polish, I chose not to provide a Polish translation.
